SC Consumer

Summary
SC Consumer
DescriptionA generic consumer that receives and processes transactions coming from its blocking-transport in export.

Description

A generic consumer that receives and processes transactions coming from its blocking-transport in export.  It performs no meaningful functionality--it prints the transaction, waits the specified delay, then sends it out its analysis port.

../../../uvmc/examples_ovm/commands/consumer.cpp

#include "systemc.h"
#include "tlm.h"
#include 

#include "packet.cpp"

using namespace std;
using namespace sc_core;
using namespace tlm;

class consumer : public sc_module,
                 public tlm_blocking_put_if {

  public:
  sc_export > in;
  tlm_analysis_port ap;

  consumer(sc_module_name nm) : in("in"),
                                ap("ap")
  {
    in(*this);
  }

  virtual void put (const packet& t) {
    cout << sc_time_stamp() << " SC consumer executing packet:"
       << endl << "  " << t << endl;
    wait(10,SC_NS);
    ap.write(t);
  }
};
